schema.name: Herbed Broccoli and Cauliflower

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the cauliflower and broccoli under cold water and pat dry.
Cut the cauliflower and broccoli into florets.
In a bowl, mix together salt and ground pepper.
Sprinkle the salt and pepper mix over the cauliflower and broccoli florets, ensuring they are evenly coated.
Steam the cauliflower and broccoli until tender, about 7 minutes.
Serve the steamed herbed cauliflower and broccoli warm as a delicious, healthy side dish.

schema.description: This Herbed Broccoli and Cauliflower recipe is a delightful and healthy addition to your meal plan. Perfect for anyone following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet, this dish is not only nutritious but also packed with flavors. A part of our Healthy Recipes collection, it's been 'healthified' to ensure you enjoy a delicious yet health-conscious meal.
